name: FabCom
description: FabCom, a premier integrated, strategic marketing and advertising agency founded in 1992. FabCom is home to a team of award-winning creatives, who craft powerfully engaging advertising and neuromarketing messaging, as well as world-class business strategists and marketing architects who continually refine the smallest nuances of each campaign. FabCom is known for its specialties in dynamic one-to-one marketing, integrated, cross-platform, multi-channel, database and trigger marketing.
